Name: Curro
About the game: 'Curro is a first person shooter game. Set your record in the world generated endlessly.' You have to grab ammo and focus on your aim to keep go forward in randomly generated world and make your highest record. Gameplay Features # Randomly generated ambient dark world. # Retro low poly graphic with polygon jitter. # Gradually increasing progress speed to challenge. # Optimal world to improve your reaction speed. # Record the highest score and break your limit.
